title: need volunteers for indian flag
selftext: we are designing indian flag on rplace.in i need volunteers... join fast... my username is 'biguyindia'
comments:
We should rather help out Pakistan. There are idiots who have been deliberately painting their flag orange. 

We already have 4 flags on the canvas. What else do you need? 

Draw something new instead.
India already has a flag, thanks though ðŸ‡®ðŸ‡³
